mapper.select: SELECT cashbook_no cashbookNo, category, price, cashbook_date cashbookDate, memo FROM cashbook WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND cashbook_date = #{cashbookDate} ORDER BY cashbook_date DESC
SELECT cashbook_no cashbookNo, category, price, cashbook_date cashbookDate, memo, createdate, updatedate FROM cashbook WHERE cashbook_no = #{cashbookNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT last_insert_id()
INSERT INTO cashbook( member_id, category, cashbook_date, price, memo, createdate, updatedate ) VALUES( #{memberId}, #{category}, #{cashbookDate}, #{price}, #{memo}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE cashbook SET category = #{category}, price = #{price}, memo = #{memo}, updatedate = NOW() WHERE cashbook_no = #{cashbookNo}
mapper.select: SELECT MIN(createdate) firstCreatedate FROM cashbook WHERE member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT YEAR(createdate) year, MONTH(createdate) MONTH, COALESCE(SUM(case when category = '수입' then price ELSE 0 END),0) totalIncome, COALESCE(SUM(case when category = '지출' then price ELSE 0 END),0) totalExpense FROM cashbook WHERE YEAR(createdate) = #{year} AND member_id = #{memberId} GROUP BY YEAR(createdate), MONTH(createdate)
